summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to land use and zoning; repealing Section 23.48.022, amending Sections 23.22.052, 23.22.100, 23.24.020, 23.24.035, 23.24.040, 23.53.015 and 23.53.020, and adding a new Section 23.53.006 to the Seattle Municipal Code to amend the requirements for pedestrian access and circulation.
